home.presentation: I like to create modern, intuitive and responsive web applications. I mainly work with React and Redux.

background.title: Background
background.studies: 🎓 After obtaining my Bachelor's degree in literature, I went to university to strengthen my skills in english, then I spent two years learning chinese.
background.working: 💼 Then, for my first professional experience, I worked two years in a retail store of a major french brand.
background.discovering: 🌱 I discovered that web development was a thing in 2018. Out of curiosity, I took some free online courses and just like that, I made my very first websites. I was excited - and still am - to find out all the things that I could create with a bit of logic and creativity.
background.training:
💻 I registered at O'clock school for an intensive six month remote training course:
  • Three months to learn the basics of web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL).
  • One month of React - Redux specialization.
  • One month project in a team of five developers, following Scrum framework.
background.diploma: ✔️ I’ve been certified by Opquast in 'Mastering Web Quality Assurance' and obtained a 'Web and Mobile Web Developer' state diploma in may 2021 (BTEC Higher National Diploma).

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.traveling: 🗺️ Traveling around the world : For the past ten years, in self-organization, I’ve had the chance to explore and discover 21 countries. I am quite simply unable to tell which one was the most incredible ; it has always been a series of unique experiences and encounters, but Japan and Greece definitely have a special place in my heart.
hobbies.hiking: ⛰️ Hiking : As a child already, I spent every summer hiking in the Pyrenees with my family, and I never lost that interest while growing up. From Austrian Tyrol and Bulgarian Pirin National Park to impressive Norwegian fjords, every country I visited gave me opportunities to nurture this passion.
hobbies.gaming: 🎮Video & board games : Either independant or big licenses games, RPG, TPS, strategy, open-world, … I’m curious enough to try every game that tickles my curiosity. All time favorites - at this time - : Hollow Knight, Outer Wilds, Stardew Valley. As for board games, I am more inclined to play cooperative games but I’m always up for a friendly competition.
hobbies.reading: 📚 Reading : Voracious reader, I especially enjoy reading fantasy and science-fiction novels.

taleMe.description: Final month school project. Using the series 'The book where you're the hero' as a source of inspiration, TaleMe allows you to read, create and share interactive stories with other users. App created in a month, following Scrum methodology (daily meeting, sprint planning and retrospective), in a team of 5 developers.

yaac.description: Web application that allows you to create a unique, personalized avatar and to download it. Project in tandem with an illustration designer from Lille.

portfolio.description: Portfolio of websites and web applications I have had the opportunity to work on.

wingsCo.description: Application for logging and comparing scores obtained in “Wingspan” board game. Under construction 🚧
wingsCo.githubMessage: This repository is private for now
wingsCo.urlMessage: This project hasn't been released yet

contact.subtitle: Let's get in touch !
contact.text:
I’m currently living in Lille, France but I’m open to international opportunities. I’m interested in the entire frontend spectrum and in working on socially engaged or cultural projects with positive people.
Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll get back to you as soon as I can !
